title: Can Riot please make TeamBuilder the main queue
body: I would play this game so much more if TB replaced Blind, now suddenly you can always play what you want, choose what team comp you join and you don't have to deal with the "I'm not going X role" people because you could just kick them if they went against the role they chose.

replies.body: Some of us are forced into blind pick when we don't want to because half the community is stuck with this stigma that TB is problematic or the que is too long. The ques are long when half the people playing aren't in teambuilder.
Blind really needs to be removed, all it is is people instalocking, trolling, "I called mid first" and a bunch of toxic behavior, if they removed blind all this would be fixed.

So your argument is "The queues are only long because everyone plays blind" like honestly listen to what your saying.... You said "Everyone plays blind" thus meaning more people prefer blind pick. So why would you get rid of the most played game type on league of legends?
